1�You should be able to head  [to the other side/over there] if you have the 3???? and 3????.
1�Head  [for the other side/over there]?Yes.No.Dive right in.
l!�<Oh ho ho, how long hath it been since we have seen one of Zacariah's blood?>
1�<We know that geomancers, who master indicolure magic and purify the lifestream, offer thy shells to the land here.>
1�<Then tell us, blood of Zacariah. Why is the lifestream volatile and disrupted elsewhere, yet not here? Are there those who do not believe Zacariah?>
1�<Blood of Zacariah, thou dost deign to understand us, but thou dost not.>
1�<Our anger is not the source of thine anguish. It is all the geomancers themselves.>
1�<Thine awe of nature has turned to a fear of destroying it, and thy ringing bells have actualized it as a Communion.>
1�<A Communion is a pact with nature. It represents thy will of how things should be, not how they are.>
1�<Dear child, thy bell, too, doth shake in apprehension.>
1�<And what if thou were to succeed? What wouldst thy pact be?>
1�<Come, geomancer! Let thy Communion be heard throughout Adoulin!>
1�What pact will you swear?To bring harmony to nature in Adoulin.To protect Adoulin's natural environment.To do everything possible to save nature.
1�<The bell doth ring. We shall respect thy Communion!>
1�The spirits of my ancestors are always watching over me from this place...I think.
1�But it's still really scary to come here by myself, you know?
1�Somehow, I made it here in one piece, so it's time to ring the bell and begin the ceremony!
1�Won't you come pray with me,  ?
1�Daddy, may the lifestream keep you snug in its warm embrace. May you become one with nature, and may she always keep you saf
e.�The ceremony has been completed, now that I've buried the stones you gathered for me.
1� , do you remember how Lhaiso rang her bell and called forth the Communion?
1�I think the way my bloodline rings our bells to send off the dead is pretty similar.
1�It's been said that though our spirits rise into the sky when we die, a geomancer's flesh returns to the ground and becomes part of the lifestream.
1�The more we train to use the lifestream, the more we aid nature in all her forms. And now that Daddy is part of the lifestream, he is watching over us all.
1�But this is a belief held only by the descendants of Zacariah, and other geomancers don't lend an ear to our concerns...
1�He was one of the five disciples of Sih Renaye--and his grave is the only one left standing.
1�The legends state the other four were chosen by the higher power, and their corporeal forms vanished from Vana'diel.
1�But Zacariah was not, so he was left in this land, cold and alone.
1�Many people say that this is because Zacariah was a traitor.
1�But, I mean, no one knows for sure, right?
1�At least Lhaiso was kind enough to listen to me.
1�Oh--I totally forgot! She gave me a message for you.
1�She wants you to see her at the Order of Renaye in Eastern Adoulin.(Oh, Sylvie, you went and forgot something important again--!)
1� , do you remember what we talked about the last time we were here?
1�You know--what Zacariah's descendants believe about geomancers returning to the earth and becoming part of the lifestream after having understood the intricacies of nature.
1�I think that's the reason why Zacariah, who was branded a traitor, was buried here in the caverns.
1�And likely the reason many of my family chose this as their final resting place as well.
1�...You ready to try this,  ? Let's hope that my ancestors help us to ring the bell.
1�Th-that's right, great higher power...sir? We've done as our tradition tells us.
1�W-well...Zacariah is believed to be a traitor. We do what we can, but...
1�I just know th-that Daddy's death can help bring the other geomancers around! If we can get them to agree, then we can help bring harmony to nature!
1�So please, stop harming the other g-geomancers and save Lhaiso!
1�If it'll help, I'm ready to become p-part of the lifestream right now!
1�I-I don't think I understand...
1�Please, the...the higher power...stop my Communion...
1� ...! This is awestupendomentous! I never imagined words could have such power!
1�And I feel...I feel wonderful! It's all thanks to you!
1�And, of course, to Daddy...and my ancestors.
1�Let's go back to Adoulin Waterfront. I think we have a lot to talk about.
1�Are you good at sneaking about?<Shuffle, shuffle>.<Clomp, clomp, clomp>.
1�What part of Arciela do you look at?Her glowing face.Her buxom bosom.Her sheathed hips.
1�What do you ask?Is that the founder king's sword?
1�Who's there?
